name: black_canary
description: Demo Codebase for the research study - **Helping or Hindering? How Browser Extensions Undermine Security?** under submission. *** ## Components The pipeline consists of three major stages of analysis:  - Pre-filtering, URL extraction & instrumentation of browser extensions.  - Dynamic analysis of instrumented extensions & header interception.  - Comparitive analysis between original and extension-procesed headers. ***
author: Shubham Agarwal
